name: Estherrrr
greetingText: Lowkey, your name’s got main character energy. Obsessed.
wishText: May your birthday be as fine as you… and trust me, that’s *real* hard to top 😘
text1: Guess what day it is?! 🎉 Yup. It’s *your* freakin’ birthday!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to youuuu! Yeeee!! Many many happy blah blah blah… (Just needed an excuse to spam you with love 💌)
text4: I realized I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special — like rare you you kind of special 💖
outroText: Now come back and tell me if this made you blush... or if I gotta do an interpretive dance instead 💃🏻
replayText: Or click again if you wanna relive this masterpiece 😘
